wikipedia_page.main: Paul Cunningham (born 1969) is an English chef working in Denmark. He was awarded a Michelin star at The Paul (da) and as of 2017, has two stars at Henne Kirkeby Kro.

response: *Paul Cunningham (chef) (born 1969), English chef working in Denmark
*Paul Cunningham (minister) (1937–2020), minister in Church of the Nazarene
*Paul Cunningham (rugby union), Irish rugby union player and coach

Henne Kirkeby Kro is an inn (kro) in the village of  in Varde Municipality, Denmark. It was established in 1790 and since 2007 has been owned by Flemming Skouboe. The restaurant is managed by former chef Garrey Dawson and under chef Paul Cunningham was awarded a Michelin star in 2016 and a second in 2017.
